attributes.additional_details: Government should require organisations responsible for maintaining cemeteries to install CCTV cameras, to deter theft and vandalism and help catch those responsible.
attributes.background: Government should require organisations responsible for maintaining cemeteries to install CCTV cameras, to deter theft and vandalism and help catch those responsible.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require all cemeteries to have CCTV
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599646
